text: Julius Francis Joseph "Pembroke Peach" Nighbor (January 26, 1893 - April 13, 1966) was a Canadian professional ice hockey forward.Dryden(1998), pg. 147 In March 2010, at a Quebec auction, an American collector paid $33,000 USD to secure Frank Nighbor's game-worn Ottawa Senators sweater from the 1926â€“27 season. He played for the Ottawa Senators of the National Hockey League (NHL) and National Hockey Association (NHA) and Toronto Maple Leafs of the NHL, Toronto Blueshirts of the NHA and Vancouver Millionaires of the Pacific Coast Hockey Association (PCHA). Nighbor died of cancer on April 13, 1966 in Pembroke, Ontario at the age of 73. ==References== ==Further reading== * * ==Other websites== * * Category:1893 births Category:1966 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Cancer deaths in Ontario Category:Hart Memorial Trophy winners Category:Hockey Hall of Fame inductees Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Lady Byng Memorial Trophy winners Category:Ottawa Senators (NHA) players Category:People from Pembroke, Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Ontario Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:Toronto Blueshirts players
title: Frank Nighbor
